name: Day Off (itch)
description:
Controls-
Arrow Keys- Move
LShift- Run
Z- Select/interact
X- Cancel/Menu

Premise-
In Day Off, you create a little character and then given 4 and a half minutes of time to kill before the day ends and you've got to go back to sleep. How do you spend that time you ask? However you like! Check your email! Look at a dog! Help some little girl cheat her way through hide and seek! Be really crappy to EVERYBODY! Only the truly skilled can get it all done in one day! For the rest of you, you may find the world changing depending on the way you act and treat other people in this game, choosing which little missions to complete and how to complete them gives you a little bit of a different ending. Perhaps there's no 'end all' consequences, but every new day is as important as the last in the name of making memories!

Carpe Diem, people!

We here at Larkison Labs have only one question on our minds right now;
How was your day?

-This game was made over a period of 3 days with RPGMaker MV for Free Lives Game Jam 2016 South Africa under the theme of
